Name: Nadir: A Grimdark Deckbuilder
About the game: ABANDON ALL HOPE, YE WHO ENTER HERE Nadir is a dark deck building rogue-like adventure, with its artwork burning of infernal fire and many extraordinary inspirations, the deepest of them coming straight from Danteâ€™s Divine Comedy . The illegitimate child of Slay the Spire and Darkest Dungeon awaits you! Command an avatar of one of the Deadly Sins in 1v1 fights against powerful demons. ðŸ”¥ DOUBLE CARDS Engage in card battles where each of your cards can be played in two ways, depending on its color: blue or red.
